briefdescription.para: Logger for logging events and errors.
Low-level HTTP client to send requests.
Base URL of the REST API.
JSON object mapper for serialization/deserialization: converts between JSON and Java objects.
Constructs the ApiClient with the given base URL.

para.verbatim: If the base URL ends with "/", the slash is removed to avoid double slashes.

parameterdescription.para: [String] Base URL of the REST API, such as "http://localhost:8080".

para.verbatim: Retrieves a list of all appetizers from the backend.
Retrieves an appetizer by its ID from the backend.

detaileddescription.para: Creates a new appetizer in the backend.

simplesect.para: [Appetizer] Created Appetizer object returned from the backend.

detaileddescription.para: Updates an existing appetizer in the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the appetizer to update.

simplesect.para: [Appetizer] Updated Appetizer object returned from the backend.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes an existing appetizer in the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the appetizer to delete.

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves a list of all cashiers from the backend.
Retrieves a cashier by its ID from the backend.
Retrieves a cashier by its username from the backend.

para.verbatim: Updates an existing cashier in the backend (name and/or salary).

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the cashier to update.

simplesect.para: [Cashier] Updated Cashier object returned from the backend.

para.verbatim: Retrieves a list of all drinks from the backend.
Retrieves a drink by its ID from the backend.
Creates a new drink in the backend.

simplesect.para: [Drink] Created Drink object returned from the backend.

para.verbatim: Updates an existing drink in the backend by its ID.

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the drink to update.

simplesect.para: [Drink] Updated Drink object returned from the backend.

para.verbatim: Deletes an existing drink in the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the drink to delete.

para.verbatim: Retrieves a list of all maincourses from the backend.
Retrieves a maincourse by its ID from the backend.
Creates a new maincourse in the backend.

simplesect.para: [MainCourse] Created MainCourse object returned from the backend.

para.verbatim: Updates an existing maincourse in the backend.

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the maincourse to update.

simplesect.para: [MainCourse] Updated MainCourse object returned from the backend.

para.verbatim: Deletes an existing maincourse in the backend by its ID.

parameterdescription.para: [Long] ID of the maincourse to delete.

briefdescription.para: Legacy login method kept for compatibility.

para.verbatim: If authentication is added in the future, it can be implemented here.

briefdescription.para: Authenticates a user against the backend.

para.verbatim: Sends a POST request to "/api/login" with username and password. If the response status is 200, it returns the User parsed from JSON. For any other status code it throws ApiClientException.

briefdescription.para: Package-private constructor to allow injecting a custom HttpClient and ObjectMapper for tests.
Execute an IOCallable and centralize exception handling to avoid duplicated catch blocks across methods.

parameterdescription.para: short description used in exception messages
the operation that may throw InterruptedException/IOException

memberdef.argsstring: (String action, HttpRequest request, ResponseHandler< R > handler)
memberdef.name: sendAndHandle

briefdescription.para: Send the given request, log status and body, and delegate response handling to the provided handler.

detaileddescription.para: Throws InterruptedException/IOException so it can be wrapped by execute(...).

briefdescription.para: Generic GET helper that returns a single object.

para.verbatim: It validates the HTTP status code before attempting to parse JSON. - If status is 200299 and body is non-empty: parse JSON. - If status is 204 or body is empty: return null. - For any other status: throw ApiClientException with details.

simplesect.para: [T] Object of type T or null if 204 / empty body.

briefdescription.para: Generic method for GET requests returning lists.

detaileddescription.para:
It validates the HTTP status code before attempting to parse JSON.
If status is 200299 and body is non-empty: parse JSON.
If status is 204 or body is empty: return an empty list.
For any other status: throw ApiClientException with details.

simplesect.para: [List<T>] List of objects of type T.

memberdef.argsstring: (String path, T body, Class< R > responseType)
memberdef.name: post

briefdescription.para: Generic POST helper that sends an object and returns a response object.

detaileddescription.para:
It validates the HTTP status code before attempting to parse JSON.
If status is 200299: parse JSON.
For any other status: throw ApiClientException with details.

briefdescription.para: API client for interacting with the backend REST API.

para.verbatim: Wraps HttpClient and provides methods to: - perform CRUD operations on Appetizers, Cashiers, Drinks, MainCourses. - send login requests to the backend.
